food.question: I am long and yellow. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I grow on trees
💛 My peel is the color of the sun
🐒 Monkeys peel me before eating me

food.question: I am round and red or green. You can take a bite out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree
🐛 Sometimes I have a worm inside!
🍎 My name is a popular company and their products

food.question: I am crunchy and orange. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me
👀 Eating me can help you see better

food.question: I am white and cold. I am made from milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a delicious treat
🌡️ I melt in the sun
🥄 You usually eat me with a spoon

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable
🍵 You might eat me with chopsticks
🌿 My name sounds similar to 'peace'

food.question: I am made from flour and baked in the oven. You can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be brown or white
🥪 You can put peanut butter and jelly on me
🔥 I need to be cooked so it doesn't taste like dough

food.question: I am yellow and come from a hen. You can scramble me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I come in a shell
🍳 You can eat me for breakfast
🐔 A chicken lays me

food.question: I am long and brown. I grow underground, and you can mash me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am a root vegetable
🍟 You can make fries out of me
🌍 Ireland is famous for me

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have small black seeds inside
🌳 I grow on a vine
🧃 You can use me to make juice.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten in Asian countries. You eat me with chopsticks or a fork. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am often served with stir-fry
🌾 I grow in paddies
🌎 More than half the world's population eats me!

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I shine in the daytime.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm very bright.
🔥 I can be very hot.

weather.question: I make the trees sway back and forth. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I'm air moving around.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ You can build a snowman using me.
🥶 I am frozen water.

weather.question: I am a big, white, fluffy thing in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep in the sky.
🌧️ Sometimes rain falls from me.
☁️ I'm made of tiny water droplets.

weather.question: I am a storm with lots of rain, thunder, and bright flashes. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I have lightning.
⛈️ I can be scary with loud booms.
☔ You need to stay inside during me.

weather.question: I am a colourful arc in the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colours like red, yellow, and blue.
✨ You can sometimes see me after a storm.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky, sometimes in small balls. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and icy.
🤕 It can hurt if I hit you.
🥶 I am like frozen raindrops.

weather.question: I am very strong wind that spins in a circle. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can cause a lot of damage.
🏠 You need to take shelter from me.
🌀 I look like a spinning funnel.

weather.question: I'm a mix of snow and rain, making things wet and icy. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm wetter than snow, but colder than rain.
🥶 I can make roads slippery.
🌧️ I am a combination of two kinds of weather.
